channel.title: UR-RAD 2025
channel.description: The 3rd AAAI Fall Symposium on Unifying Representations for Robot Application Development

item.title: A Categorical Representation Language and Computational System for Knowledge-Based Robotic Task Planning
item.description: A novel categorical approach to representing and reasoning about robotic tasks using category theory and compositional structures for enhanced task planning capabilities.

item.title: Grounding Complex Natural Language Commands for Temporal Tasks in Unseen Environments
item.description: A framework for interpreting and executing complex temporal natural language commands in novel environments using compositional semantic parsing and temporal logic representations.
